snippet.title: Vince Vaughn Buys Former USC Football Coach Lane Kiffin's $6.5 Million Beach House
snippet.description: ‘Guy’s guy’ actor Vince Vaughn just helped out former USC football coach Lane Kiffin by taking his high-priced Manhattan Beach mansion off his hands, paying $6,447,000 for the place. First reported by the Los Angeles Times, the ‘Wedding Crashers’ and ‘Old School’ actor was identified as the buyer for Kiffin’s 7,308 square foot Craftman-style home, [...] read »

snippet.title: National Signing Day: Adoree' Jackson To USC, Alabama Gets Top Class
snippet.description: College football's National Signing Day is one of the sport's biggest events of the year, and the day's many announcements send college football fans across the country into frenzies of joy and disappointment. The biggest names left on the docket have finally announced their destinations. read »

snippet.title: Kiffin Self-Destructed At USC
snippet.description: Old Trojans don't die, they just move to Newport Beach. Wealthy alums here venerate a winning USC football tradition. Houses hang USC banners and flags, Cardinal and gold colors are everywhere. I am grudgingly tolerated as a Cal-Berkeley alum. A whole lifestyle revolves around SC football in Southern California. The alums [...] read »

snippet.title: Fresno State, USC Both Hurt Their Image During 2013 Royal Purple Las Vegas Bowl
snippet.description: Some football games are just hard to watch, and as I left USC's 45-20 victory over Fresno State in the 2013 Royal Purple Las Vegas Bowl before the fourth quarter began, I drove away wondering if both programs had actually just really hurt themselves. Normally during bowl season, despite the fact [...] read »

snippet.title: USC's Fall From College Sports Elite A Cautionary Tale
snippet.description: Déjà vu - a fleeting sensation that one has experienced a unique event in the past. Although the majority of people experience this unpleasant feeling at random, fans of the University of Southern California(USC) Trojans are becoming accustomed to seemingly never ending bouts of Déjà vu. A once mighty beacon of college athletics [...] read »

snippet.title: Lane Kiffin's Ousting At USC About Economics, Branding, And Survival
snippet.description: No 'Sweet Memory Lane' for Coach Kiffin, now the ex-USC head football coach after being ousted by AD and former Trojan quarterback Pat Haden hours after the team's blowout loss at Arizona State. The folks in Knoxville TN and Westwood Village are hootin' and hollerin' this morn over the demise of [...] read »

snippet.title: Kiffin Fired At USC For At Least 10 Good Reasons
snippet.description: 10 reasons why Lane Kiffin firing this early in the season was mandatory for a program that expects excellence. Is Chip Kelly alergic to Eagles in Philly? read »

snippet.title: Quarterback Matt Barkley Selects CAA Sports For Representation
snippet.description: Quarterback Matt Barkley #7 of the USC Trojans has signed a Standard Representation Agreement with agents at Creative Artists Agency. (Image credit: Getty Images via @daylife) University of Southern California quarterback, Matt Barkley has chosen Creative Artists Agency (CAA) as his sports agency of record.
